ing: 1 (6 ounce) can frozen orange juice concentrate, thawed
1 (6 ounce) can frozen grapefruit juice concentrate, thawed
1 (6 ounce) can frozen lemonade concentrate, thawed
des: "This recipe has been a family favorite for years! Makes lots of non-alcoholic punch for a crowd."
ins: Combine club soda, ginger ale, cranberry juice, orange juice, grapefruit juice, and lemonade in a large punch bowl. Add ice and stir.
